summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1453, for the improvement of North Fifty-eight Street, from Phinney Avenue to First Avenue Northeast, First Avenue Northwest, from North Fifty-eight Street to West Fifty-eight Street; and West Fifty-eighth Street, from First Avenue Northwest to Second Avenue Northwest produced, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains therein, together with appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 15622 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
